articles.author: Praveen Menon, Lewis Jackson, Wayne Cole
articles.title: Australia rejects Indigenous referendum in setback for reconciliation - Reuters
articles.description: Australia on Saturday decisively rejected a proposal to recognise Indigenous people in the constitution, in a major setback to the country's efforts for reconciliation with its First Peoples.
articles.content: SYDNEY, Oct 14 (Reuters) - Australia on Saturday decisively rejected a proposal to recognise Indigenous people in the constitution, in a major setback to the country's efforts for reconciliation with… [+5329 chars]
